pr_title: [ML] only persist progress if it has changed

timeline.message:
[ML] only persist progress if it has changed

We already search for the previously stored progress document.

For optimization purposes, and to prevent restoring the same
progress after a failed analytics job is stopped,
this commit does an equality check between the previously stored progress and current progress
If the progress has changed, persistence continues as normal.

timeline.bodyText: Could you explain how we could have leftover progress here?
timeline.author: dimitris-athanasiou

replies.bodyText:
@dimitris-athanasiou the overall change only partially handles the race condition window.

force close a job
persist progress
delete job (deletes previous progress)
job finally fires onCancelled()
job sees that there was no previous progress persisted
persists the new progress
replies.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: OK, I think we can then remove the assertion here entirely. I'll add a test dedicated to deleting a job and checking things like the stored progress doc was cleaned up in a separate PR.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.message: removing assertion on left over progress
